#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
int main()
{
int t;
long int count=0;
char str[100002];
long int len;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
count=0;
scanf("%s",str);
len=strlen(str);
for(int i=0;i<len;++i)
{
if(str[i]=='T')
++count;
if(str[i]=='D')
--count;
if(count<0)
{
printf("NO\n");
break;
}
}
if(count==0)
printf("YES\n");
if(count>0)
printf("NO\n");
 
}
return 0;
}
